name: Name
apis.summary: These are our API products that are AI models served on-demand.
home.title: Simplesia offers AI model APIs on-demand
home.subtitle: Describe a little bit about the architecture of the platform
home.point: Make some good points to sell the platform
home.point1: Serverless architecture keeps costs low, you only pay for what you use
home.point2: We’ll take care of the AI and you can continue to focus on what you need to succeed
home.point6: Straightforward monthly billing in your currency
home.point7: Request or customize your own API
home.bottom: Custom, optimized, and performant solutions…contact us
privacy.1: Weorth, LLC uses a PCI compliant 3rd party payment gateway, Stripe
privacy.2: No personal or private information is kept or shared by Weorth, LLC
privacy.3: Full account data can be deleted on request
privacy.4: All security breaches and etc. will be announced to users immediately, to include the follow up and solution
terms.1: Weorth, LLC is not responsible for the performance of general usage APIs and provides a customized solution for optimal performance
terms.2: Not responsible for the nature of the content submitted by its users
terms.3: No user content is saved from general usage APIs unless granted by the user or part of a customized solution related to a specific account
terms.4: Charges are only applicable for requests that do not end in error caused by internal workings or infrastructure of Simplesia
terms.5: Improper usage can lead to account deletion and banning, and/or fees, and possible legal action
terms.6: Accounts that are inactive for 90 days will be deleted
terms.7: Billing is done on a monthly basis, invoices are sent at the end of the month
terms.8: Overdue accounts will be suspended fully after a 5 day grace period, but access will be limited during this time
terms.9: There is a $1 minimum fee per month in order to maintain an active API key, and if usage is over $1 then the $1 fee is waived
